description: v7.5.1 layout system with L02 Analytics layout added for Analytics Service integration. Core layouts: L29 (Hero), L25 (Content), L02 (Analytics Charts).

L02.name: Analytics Chart Layout
L02.best_use_case: Analytics slides with charts and data visualizations. Two-column layout with chart (1260×720px) on left and observations/insights (540×720px) on right. Optimized for Chart.js visualizations from Analytics Service v3.

slide_title.description: Slide title - layout_builder formats as plain text

element_1.description: Subtitle area - layout_builder formats as plain text

element_3.description: Chart/diagram area (1260×720px, 21 grids wide). Analytics Service v3 provides Chart.js HTML with inline scripts. Layout Builder v7.5.1 supports HTML auto-detection and rendering.
element_3.expected_structure: Chart.js HTML with canvas and script tags, or diagram HTML. Dimensions: 1260×720px.

element_2.description: Observations/insights area (540×720px, 9 grids wide). Analytics Service v3 provides formatted HTML with observations. Layout Builder v7.5.1 supports both HTML and plain text with auto-detection.
element_2.expected_structure: HTML with styled observations or plain text. Dimensions: 540×720px. Supports scrolling for long content.

presentation_name.description: Presentation name for footer (left side) - layout_builder formats

company_logo.description: Company logo/emoji for footer (right side) - layout_builder formats

L29.name: Full-Bleed Hero
L29.best_use_case: Opening slides, closing slides, section dividers, and any slide requiring maximum visual impact. Spans entire viewport (1920×1080) with no margins or borders. Ideal for dramatic statements, large visuals, or creating powerful transitions between sections.

hero_content.description: Full HTML content for hero slide. Text Service has complete creative control over styling, layout, and formatting. Viewport: 1920×1080px.
hero_content.expected_structure: Any valid HTML - complete creative freedom

L25.name: Main Content Shell
L25.best_use_case: All content slides including text, bullet points, analytics, tables, diagrams, charts, and mixed content. Provides structured layout with title/subtitle area (rows 2-3) and large rich content area (rows 5-16, ~1800×720px) where Text Service has full creative control. Includes optional footer with presentation name and logo.

slide_title.description: Slide title - layout_builder formats as plain text

subtitle.description: Optional subtitle - layout_builder formats as plain text

rich_content.description: Main content area (1800×720px). Text Service owns formatting and has complete creative control. Can contain any HTML including lists, tables, charts, diagrams, mixed content.
rich_content.expected_structure: Any valid HTML - complete creative freedom within content area

presentation_name.description: Presentation name for footer (left side) - layout_builder formats

company_logo.description: Company logo/emoji for footer (right side, 2×1 grid) - layout_builder formats
